General.Name: Xiamen Xindeco Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Xindeco Ltd. engages in the automobile distribution, supply chain, and information technology businesses in China and internationally. The company is involved in the non-ferrous metal and ferrous bulk commodity trade activities; and car dealership business. It also researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and offers application integration services for a series of software and hardware products, such as RFID electronic tags, reading and writing equipment, and RFID solutions; and develops smart city-related solutions. In addition, the company engages in the research and development, production, and sale of LED packaging and related application products, including in-line LED tubes for display screens, SMD LED tubes for display screens, high-power and low-power white LEDs, other packaging products, LED road lighting lamps , LED indoor lighting, and other application products that are used in flat panel display, general white light, special lighting, indoor and outdoor lighting, and other fields. Xiamen Xindeco Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: Building A, International Trade Center, Xiamen, China, 361016

2.Name: Mr. Xiaoshun  Wang
